title: Exploring the tiny robots improving drug delivery from inside the body - Drug Discovery News
summary_full: Exploring the tiny robots improving drug delivery from inside the body  Drug Discovery NewsEnzymatic microbubble robots  NatureBubble Bots: Simple Biocompatible Microrobots Autonomously Target Tumors (IMAGE)  EurekAlert!Researchers at the University of Southern California (USA) have created a microrobot with enzymes that 'sniff out' tumors in their environment and release medication at the right time using ultrasound.  CPG Click Petróleo e GásSelf-Guided Bubble Bots Target Tumors With Precision  AZoRobotics
